meanings.definition: Resembling a buff or yellowish-brown color.
meanings.sent1: The buffy leaves on the trees signaled the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent2: The sandy beach had a buffy hue under the setting sun.
meanings.sent3: The buffy walls of the house reminded me of a cozy cabin in the woods.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a buffy glow, like a halo in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The buffy kitten blended perfectly with the fallen leaves.

meanings.definition: Having a muscular or fit physique.
meanings.sent1: The buffy athlete easily lifted the heavy weights.
meanings.sent2: He worked hard at the gym to achieve a buffy body.
meanings.sent3: The buffy superhero costume highlighted his strong muscles.
meanings.sent4: Her buffy arms were a result of dedicated workouts.
meanings.sent5: The buffy wrestler was a formidable opponent in the ring.

meanings.definition: A fan or enthusiast of the television show 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer.'
meanings.sent1: As a buffy, she knew every episode of the show by heart.
meanings.sent2: The buffy attended the comic con dressed as their favorite character.
meanings.sent3: The buffy's collection of memorabilia from the show was impressive.
meanings.sent4: He felt like a true buffy when he met the cast at a fan event.
meanings.sent5: The buffy's excitement was contagious during the show's anniversary celebration.
